co.cask.cdap.api.mapreduce

Interface MapReduce

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMapReduce

    public interface MapReduce
    Defines an interface for the MapReduce job. Use it for easy integration (re-use) of existing MapReduce jobs that rely on the Hadoop MapReduce APIs.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void beforeSubmit(MapReduceContext context)
      Deprecated. 
      Deprecated as of 3.5.0. Please use ProgramLifecycle.initialize(T) instead, to initialize the MapReduce program.
      void configure(MapReduceConfigurer configurer)
      Configures a MapReduce job using the given MapReduceConfigurer.
      void onFinish(boolean succeeded, MapReduceContext context)
      Deprecated. 
      Deprecated as of 3.5.0. Please use ProgramLifecycle.destroy() instead to execute the code once MapReduce program is completed either successfully or on failure.

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        void configure(MapReduceConfigurer configurer)
        Configures a MapReduce job using the given MapReduceConfigurer.

      • beforeSubmit

        @Deprecated
void beforeSubmit(MapReduceContext context)
                  throws Exception
        Deprecated. Deprecated as of 3.5.0. Please use ProgramLifecycle.initialize(T) instead, to initialize the MapReduce program.
        Invoked before starting a MapReduce job.

        Users can access and modify the job configuration via MapReduceContext.getHadoopJob(), which returns an instance of org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Job.

        Parameters:
        context - job execution context
        Throws:
        Exception - if there's an error during this method invocation

      • onFinish

        @Deprecated
void onFinish(boolean succeeded,
                       MapReduceContext context)
              throws Exception
        Deprecated. Deprecated as of 3.5.0. Please use ProgramLifecycle.destroy() instead to execute the code once MapReduce program is completed either successfully or on failure.
        Invoked after a MapReduce job finishes.

        Will not be called if:

        • Job failed to start

        Parameters:
        succeeded - defines the result of job execution: true if job succeeded, false otherwise
        context - job execution context
        Throws:
        Exception - if there's an error during this method invocation.
